page.title: 15A Old House in Ellacombe
page.content: I live at 31 Warbro Road. It is a very busy road. My house is quite near to six schools: St.Margaret's Primary, Ellacombe Primary, Westlands Bilateral - Lower and Higher, Homelands Infants, and Babbacombe Primary. The house is about a hundred years old. The walls are made of granite. The roof is now grey tiles but these were put up only a little while ago to replace the old slate. We also have new double glazed windows to make the house warmer and to cut down on the noise. I have a small back garden and there is a lane behind our garage. Next door there is an old shop where my dad's friend lives. Close by there is a park, Plainmoor shops, the swimming pool and Torquay United Football ground.
